thread.title: Author offers tips on raising kids without all the screams
thread.title_full: Author offers tips on raising kids without all the screams

author: STEPHEN KOPFINGER | LNP CORRESPONDENT
title: Author offers tips on raising kids without all the screams
text:
Close 1 of 2 
Hal Edward Runkel, author of “ScreamFree Parenting: The Revolutionary Approach to Raising Your Kids by Keeping Your Cool,” will speak Tuesday at Lancaster Country Day School. 
Hal Edward Runkel, author of “ScreamFree Parenting: The Revolutionary Approach to Raising Your Kids by Keeping Your Cool,” will speak Tuesday at Lancaster Country Day School. centerpiece Author offers tips on raising kids without all the screams Hal Edward Runkel advises parents to learn to keep calm, help kids control themselves STEPHEN KOPFINGER | LNP CORRESPONDENT
